response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it would greatly enhance your operations or personal use. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an asset that is worth $15,000 to us but is being made available to you at a competitive rate. We are confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency, cost savings, or increased satisfaction. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 12000}
